amendment.description: Amendment sought to increase the funding for operations and administration in the International Trade Administration by $3 million and to reduce funding for salaries and expenses of the Federal Prison System by a similar amount.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase the funding for operations and administration in the International Trade Administration by $3 million and to reduce funding for salaries and expenses of the Federal Prison System by a similar amount.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Davis (CA) amendment (A002) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Davis (CA) amendment (A002) Failed by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A002) offered by Mrs. Davis (CA).
